sentences.sentence: A miasma of stale alcohol hung around him.
sentences.translation: 他身上老有股难闻的酒精味。

sentences.sentence: As time went on, his ambition to be part of the U.S. Supreme Court faded in a miasma of alcohol and despair.
sentences.translation: 随着时间的推移，他要跻身美国最高法院的雄心壮志在酒精和绝望中消逝。

sentences.sentence: I hauled his face out of the miasma, yanked him to his feet.
sentences.translation: 我从毒气拖了他的脸，强拉了他到他的脚。
